summary: R&D Product Development Engineer with 5+ years of C and MATLAB, and 5+ years of mechanical design experience (AutoCAD, SolidWorks). Experienced in UAV/robotics, control systems, data analysis, and programming (Python, Java). Proficient with embedded systems, CAD/CAM, and lab experiments; strong cross-disciplinary skills spanning mechanical, electrical, and software domains.

experience.title: R&D Product Development Engineer
experience.description: Design and build a tail-sitter VTOL UAV; aerodynamics modeling, UAV control system design, mechanical manufacturing, simulation and experiments.

experience.title: Research Assistant
experience.description: Research assistant for Wharton School environment economics projects on Europe Emission Trading. Data collection, cleaning, merging, database construction and data analysis; skills included Java, Python, Navicat/SQLite and STATA.

experience.title: Mechanical Technician
experience.description: Check, report on reducer components, automobile chassis production; trained in mechanical manufacturing fundamentals in automotive industrial production.

education.degree: Master of Science: Mechanical Engineering & Applied Mechanics
education.school: University of Pennsylvania, School of Engineering and Applied Science

education.degree: Bachelor of Science: Mechanical Design and Automation
